title: spiced lamb flatbread
description: This delectable homemade flatbread is topped with spiced minced lamb, hot chillies and zingy herbs.Each serving provides 424kcal, 21g protein, 57g carbohydrate (of which 10g sugars), 12g fat (of which 5g saturates), 3g fibre and 0.8g salt.
ingredients: 400g/14oz type ‘00’ flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
